vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.CashOut (patch_6.sol#29-39):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_6.sol#34-36)
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,_am,CashOut) (patch_6.sol#35)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_6.sol#34-36)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_6.sol#38)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.Deposit (patch_6.sol#18-27):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_6.sol#23)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_6.sol#26)
